articles.title: Joint Conference of Officials of Party, State, Economic and Armed Forces Organs Held
articles.content:
Joint Conference of Officials of Party, State, Economic and Armed Forces Organs Held
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A joint conference of officials of the party, state, economic and armed forces organs took place in Pyongyang on Saturday and Sunday to discuss ways for carrying through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					Attending it were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, and officials of local party and power organs and major industrial establishments.
					
					Pak Pong Ju made a report.
					
					He said that Kim Jong Un in his historic New Year Address, full of his will to devote himself to the country and people and warm love for them, proudly reviewed the successes made last year and showed an avenue for this year's march.
					
					The miraculous achievements in all fields of the revolution and construction last year are precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the reporter stressed.
					
					He put forward the goals on important items to be carried out by the sectors of the national economy this year and referred to the issues arising in attaining them.
					
					He stressed the need to attain earlier the goals for this year, a year of important significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, and further glorify the prosperous Kim Jong Un era.
					
					Then inter-sector meetings of the national economy were held.
					
					The meetings worked out the realistic and scientific militant goals in all sectors of the national economy and discussed the measures for hitting them.
					
					The meetings discussed in depth the concrete orientation and ways for implementing the militant goals of all fields and units by dynamically waging a drive for producing and economizing as much as possible upholding the slogan of self-reliance and self-sufficiency.
					
					Speakers at the meetings expressed their will to fully discharge the missions and duties as vanguard fighters in the new era of the Juche revolution in the all-out general offensive this year in order to attain the height of the five-year strategy for national economic development, true to the Party's idea and intention.

articles.title: Reception Given for Korean Schoolchildren in Japan
articles.content:
Reception Given for Korean Schoolchildren in Japan 
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for an art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday under the loving care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. The troupe took part in the New Year celebration performance.
					 Present there on invitation was the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan headed by O Haeng Dok, vice-director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 On hand were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol said that through the New Year performance the members of the art troupe showed their resolve to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and grow up to be dependable pillars of the movement of Koreans in Japan under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that Korean schoolchildren in Japan would prepare themselves to be reliable successors of Chongryon creditably inheriting the tradition of the nation and patriotism. 
					
					 O Haeng Dok said that Korean schoolchildren in Japan would prepare themselves to be the master of Chongryon with firm faith that they are sure to win as they are led by Kim Jong Un, symbol of the dignity of the nation and its mightiness.
					
					 Schoolchildren in Pyongyang and members of the art troupe gave a joint performance.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to DR Congo Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to DR Congo Appointed
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Myong Sik was appointed as DPRK ambassador to DR Congo, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Workers and Peasants Vow to Implement New Year Tasks
articles.content:
Workers and Peasants Vow to Implement New Year Tasks
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and other workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) and other peasants held meetings at Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326 and in Unpha County, North Hwanghae Province Monday to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Reporters and speakers at the meetings stressed that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un serves as a militant banner arousing the entire country to new miracles and feats in implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Worker's Party of Korea by giving full play to the might of single-minded unity and the strength of self-development.
					
					 They called for vigorous advance under the grandiose plan for building a powerful socialist country unfolded at the Seventh WPK Congress, in hearty response to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting of Foreign Crewmen
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting of Foreign Crewmen
 Hamhung, January 9 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting of foreign crewmen was held at Hungnam Port of the DPRK on Monday to support the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the meeting attended by the captain and crewmen of a Belizean-flagged ship, speakers paid deep respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and extended the highest glory to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Referring to the achievements made by the Korean people in the 70-day and 200-day campaigns last year to glorify the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, they said that they are a result of the single-minded unity of the army and people rallied around the great Party and their great capacity for self-development.
					
					 They stressed that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un is important guidelines accelerating the building of socialist power and the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 They wished the Korean people greater success in carrying out the tasks set forth in the New Year Address under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Need to Clearly See Who Is Principal Enemy of Nation Urged
articles.content:
Need to Clearly See Who Is Principal Enemy of Nation Urged
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Korea's reunification is the most urgent task of the nation and the unanimous desire of Koreans.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed the need to frustrate the challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad who go against the Korean nation's desire for reunification and clearly see who is the principal enemy of the nation.
					
					 The issue of who is the principal enemy of the nation is a touchstone distinguishing patriotism from treachery and a matter of properly approaching the country's reunification, the cherished desire common to the nation.
					
					 The U.S. is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it partitioned its territory into two parts. 
					
					 Owing to the U.S., the Koreans have suffered pain and misfortune from the territorial division for more than seven decades and have never been free from the constant danger of war.
					
					 The U.S. forces landed in south Korea under the pretext of "disarming" the Japanese imperialists in pursuance of their aggressive interests in the middle of the last century, dividing Korea into two parts.
					
					 Since then, the U.S. has resorted to the persistent intervention and aggression in wanton violation of the sovereignty of the Korean nation in a bid to realize the strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The criminal nature of the U.S. as a disturber of Korea's reunification had been already brought to light.
					
					 The U.S., displeased to see the Korean nation reunified as one, has pursued the scenario of sowing seeds of discord among Koreans in an effort to drive the anti-reunification forces of south Korea into confrontation and war with compatriots.
					
					 Had the U.S. quitted south Korea, taking hands off the issue of Korea, the Korean nation would have achieved the country's reunification long ago.
					
					 The unprecedented deadlock of the north-south relations at present is an inevitable result of the U.S. heinous plots and intrigues.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently interfered in the internal affairs of the Korean nation, laying a stumbling block in the way of settling the issue of reunification.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that it openly disturbed the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, agreements common to the nation, and deliberately escalated the tension whenever the movement for reconciliation grew strong between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief architect of national division and the principal enemy of the Korean nation hindering its reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the anti-reunification sycophantic and treacherous forces in south Korea are foolish enough to seek a way out in escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north, still regarding it as their principal enemy.
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers defined the compatriots in the north as the principal enemy and justified the dependence on outside forces and confrontation with the compatriots in the "defense white paper." 
					
					 Crying out for tightening alliance with the U.S., they have resorted to the smear campaign against compatriots in the north, in collusion with outside forces, and gone busy with solicitation diplomacy over the issue of national reunification, the internal issue of the Korean nation.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are pushed to the worst phase and a serious obstacle is lying in the way of the country's reunification due to acts of treachery of the Park Geun Hye group which, so obsessed with confrontation with compatriots, can hardly discern who is the real enemy of the nation.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans to dynamically stage a nationwide struggle to frustrate the moves of such anti-reunification sycophantic and treacherous forces as Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 The Koreans should struggle to solve the issue of the country's reunification through unity and alliance with the transparent viewpoint and stand, firm pluck and confidence that it can be settled by the concerted efforts of the nation responsible for it.
					
					 They should heighten the vigilance against outside forces' interference and arbitrary practices to dominate the Korean peninsula and the region, keeping the nation divided forever, and never allow such deed.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should accelerate the nation-wide reunification advance by united efforts of the nation and thus bring about a new phase of independent reunification without fail this year.

articles.title: Universities of DPRK to Provide Firmer Material and Technological Foundations
articles.content:
Universities of DPRK to Provide Firmer Material and Technological Foundations
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Major universities of the DPRK set high goals for putting material and technological foundations for education onto a world level this year in the wake of their achievements during the 200-day campaign last year.
					  Kim Il Sung University and other universities are waging a more dynamic drive to give face-lifting to them as central bases for education and scientific researches and centers of international academic exchange which can match the most prestigious universities in the world on the basis of the achievements made during the 200-day campaign.
					
					 In his New Year Address respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un set this year as a year of science and education.
					
					 Officials and teaching staff of major universities are full of enthusiasm to make more scientific and educational achievements this year by launching a dynamic drive to improve the facilities and environment for science and education with a great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force.

articles.title: Sports Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The second Sunday of every month is fixed for the sports day in the DPRK. The first day of sports for this year falls on January 8.
					 On this occasion, there are taking place group running, health-promoting Taekwon-Do, mass rhythmic exercise and other colorful sports activities throughout the country. And schoolchildren play top spinning, kite-flying, sleigh-riding and other folk games.
					
					 Numerous sports facilities are being arranged in different parts of the country where inter-industrial establishments and cooperative farms contests are visible. 
					
					 A hot wind of volleyball, table-tennis, football and tennis is raging everywhere.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thoroughly Frustrating Anti-Reunification Forces' Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Thoroughly Frustrating Anti-Reunification Forces' Moves
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article stresses the need to resolutely frustrate the vicious challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and steadily advance the cause of the country's reunification victoriously.
					 The issue of national reunification is the internal one of the Korean nation and, therefore, no one can have right to interfere, the article says, adding:
					
					 Historic lesson goes to prove that if outside forces are allowed to interfere in the internal affairs of the nation, it will be more difficult and complicated to solve it. 
					
					 Outside forces can never present reunification to the Korean nation as they have ignored the will of the Korean nation and stirred up the division of Korea in pursuit of their own interests.
					
					 Any form of interference in the issue of national reunification by outside forces would be the root cause of misfortune and pain for the Koreans. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand the Korean nation's will for reunification, stop driving the anti-reunification forces of south Korea into confrontation and a war against compatriots and drop the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out in the nation-wide struggle to frustrate the challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad. 
					
					 If all Koreans who love the country and the nation and aspire after reunification rally close as one, there is nothing impossible. 
					
					 No matter how desperately outside forces and traitors may work to block reunification, they can never overpower the concerted efforts of the compatriots.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Bold Decision to Abandon Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Bold Decision to Abandon Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The reason for the DPRK and the U.S. remaining in the hostile relationship is that the foreign policy of the DPRK contradicts that of the U.S.
					 The U.S. foreign policy is, in essence, the policy for overseas aggression and war and the policy for interference in the internal affairs of other countries, Rodong Sinmun on Monday says in an article. 
					
					 The world has long branded the U.S. as a war machine. The politics, economy and military affairs of the U.S. all exist for overseas aggression, plunder and war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the successive U.S. rulers from Truman to Obama have never wished to co-exist with the DPRK peacefully. They have tried to stifle it, always agitating confrontation with it. This is the main contents of the U.S. policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 The best way of ending the DPRK-U.S. confrontation is for the DPRK to emerge as a nuclear power and put a definite end to the U.S. nuclear threat and military blackmail.
					
					 How the DPRK-U.S. confrontation is put to an end depends on the U.S. attitude. The U.S. has to make a bold decision to abandon its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will put spurs to bolstering its nuclear deterrence under the uplifted banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts in order to check and foil the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle it and firmly defend peace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Challenging People's Mindset
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Challenging People's Mindset
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea at a "new year meet-the press" reeled off a litany of lies denying her crimes, without uttering even a word of apology. This impudent act of not feeling even an iota of guilty conscience and repentance is an unpardonable mockery and challenge to candlelight holders, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 Park who is to blame for causing the unprecedented scandal and throwing south Korea into the worst chaos and crisis is not feeling any guilty conscience but has gone all the more arrogant, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 What she uttered at the "meet-the press" was not just simple grumbling or rash act but part of her planned offensive to suppress people's mindset demanding her resignation, turn the table in her favor and regain her power at any cost.
					
					 Her sordid intention is to give a shot in the arm of the dispirited pro-Park faction, rally the conservative forces again and tide over the crisis.
					
					 However desperately the traitor may try to find a way out, she can never escape the fate of ruin. Criminals are bound to be punished and nothing can suppress the people's mindset.
					
					 Time will prove in practice what a miserable end Park will face.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Clamping down on Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Clamping down on Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea released a statement on January 5 to denounce the puppet regime's anachronistic crackdown on the progressive forces.
					 The statement charged that Park Geun Hye's remnants concluded an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan and pressed for the THAAD deployment, while putting a ban on honoring the memory of the martyrs of Kwangju Popular Uprising and victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and requesting a warrant of arrest for the representative of "Worker's Book".
					
					 It strongly condemned Park and her group's attempt to turn back the history and demanded the prompt abrogation of the "Security Law", an anti-democracy, anti-social, anti-reunification evil law.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Disregarding People's Living
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Disregarding People's Living
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on January 7 carried an editorial "Reducing income, rising price, increasing people's pain".
					 The editorial said price of primary consumer goods is rising day by day and the people cry in distress.
					
					 Although people's living standard is getting worse, the regime has not taken any measure, the editorial said, adding people undergo great pains as they voted for incompetent "president".

articles.title: To Impeach Park Geun Hye as Opportunity for Liquidating "Coloring Theory" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
To Impeach Park Geun Hye as Opportunity for Liquidating "Coloring Theory" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People in an editorial on January 6 called for taking the impeachment of Park Geun Hye as an opportunity of liquidating the "coloring theory." 
					 The editorial said that now is the time to eliminate the "coloring theory" from the political camp circle as the truth about cases of abuse of power is being revealed in succession. It stressed it is sophism and far-fetched assertion to claim that the candlelight rallies do not reflect people's mindset for the mere reason that those demanding the truth about forced disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party participated in the rallies. 
					
					 The Park regime could emerge and be maintained so far because the south Korean politics was obsessed with the "coloring theory," the editorial pointed out, adding the impeachment of Park Geun Hye should not be separated from liquidating the "coloring theory."

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Meet-the Press Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Meet-the Press Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Various circles of south Korea condemned Park Geun Hye for denying the crimes related to the hideous scandal and for shirking her responsibility at the very beginning of the new year.
					 She suddenly let journalists get in Chongwadae on January 1 and held a meet-the press allegedly to shed clear light on the scandals. There she totally denied her crimes, saying that all were distorted.
					
					 Her shameful behavior immediately sparked off a flurry of criticism from various circles of south Korea.
					
					 The newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on January 2 said that she seemed to live in her own dreamland as she said no to the reality recognized by all.
					
					 On the same day the Bar Association for Democratic Society released a commentary to denounce Park's shamefulness.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares Struggle for New Society
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares Struggle for New Society
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea reportedly held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on Jan. 3 to vow to launch struggle for liquidating evil practices of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					 In its press release the organization stressed the need to change the politics and election system to severely punish Park Geun Hye and her accomplices who abused justice and covered up truth and properly reflect the intention of the people in policies this year.
					
					 The release declared that the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society would make every possible effort to build up a new society where truth and justice win, together with citizens from all walks of life.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Calls for Ushering in Second June 15 Era This year
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Calls for Ushering in Second June 15 Era This year
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A south Korean online paper on January 1 carried an article calling for establishing a new democratic reform regime in south Korea. 
					 The democratic reform regime is a regime whose mission is to liquidate the pent-up evils and realize the people's sovereignty and which works to usher in the second June 15 era, not resorting to the hostile policy toward the north, the article said.

articles.title: 11th All-People Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
11th All-People Action Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The 11th all-people action for the ouster of the Park Geun Hye regime was reportedly staged across south Korea on January 7.
					More than 645,000 people took part in the action staged under the sponsorship of the People's Emergency Action for the Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime ahead of 1,000 days since the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					
					At least 600,000 people conducted a candlelight action in Seoul.
					
					 The People's Committee for Investigating the April 16 Ferry Sewol Tragedy was formed with due ceremony.
					
					 A candlelight rally took place at Kwanghwamun Plaza.
					
					 Similar actions were staged in all parts of south Korea. 
					
					 South Korean media including Yonhap News, Hangyore, OhmyNews, Seoul Economic Daily and Newsis reported about the actions that day in detail.

articles.title: S. Korean Buddhist Makes Self-Immolation Attempt
articles.content:
S. Korean Buddhist Makes Self-Immolation Attempt
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A south Korean Buddhist made a self-immolation attempt on January 7 in demand of the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime and justice, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 He, who took part in the 11th all-people action for urging the resignation of Park Geun Hye and the salvage of ferry Sewol staged in Seoul, set himself in fire at the Kwanghwamun Plaza toward the end of the meeting.

articles.title: Delegation of Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Delegation of Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia led by the president visited the DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh on Dec. 27 last year on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post.
					 The delegation laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid homage to them.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia said that the KPA was built as an invincible army capable of repelling all of the enemy's attacks at a strike under the leadership of HE Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and HE Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding:
					
					 It is entirely thanks to the great leaders possessed of outstanding and tested leadership ability that the Workers' Party of Korea grew up to be a party that makes selfless, devoted efforts for the people.
					
					 Good health to HE Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, personages from scores of units in China visited the DPRK mission and laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them from Dec. 30 last year to Jan. 1 this year to mark the fifth anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA and the New Year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- There took place a celebration, friendship meetings, book exhibition and film show at Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten and a company in Mongolia, a Koryo joint venture hospital in Nigeria and a company in Singapore on the occasion of the 99th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk Dec. 15-26.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were books dealing with the proud successes made by the Korean army and people under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort" was shown at the film show.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the celebration held at Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Mongolia.

articles.title: New Year Address Backed by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
New Year Address Backed by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on the New Year's Day in support of the New Year address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Reviewing proud achievements made in 2016 in his New Year address, Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un unfolded an ambitious blueprint for accomplishing the socialist cause under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He put forward the militant slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" and set forth tasks for the respective sectors to develop the country's overall economy onto a higher plane and improve the people's living standards.
					
					 He called for opening up a broad avenue to the independent reunification by a concerted effort of the whole nation in the year of the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration.
					
					 He clarified the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to make a positive contribution to safeguarding global peace and stability and remain committed to the ideas of the foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He affirmed that the DPRK will continue to build up the self-defence capability as long as the United States and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 His New Year address serves as great guidelines for the struggle to build a powerful socialist country and reunify Korea.

articles.title: Foreign Figures Wish Korean People Great Success in 2017
articles.content:
Foreign Figures Wish Korean People Great Success in 2017
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Figures of different countries issued statements from Jan. 3 to 5 in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, said that last year was a year of great significance for the DPRK as the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The New Year Address instills fresh confidence in victory into the Korean people.
					
					 The followers of the Juche idea in DR Congo and other progressives of the world are convinced that the Korean people will register greater successes in the building of a powerful socialist country in 2017, too.
					
					 We positively support the Korean people's struggle to turn a heyday in the revolution into a great golden age.
					
					  Flavio Pettinari, chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Fermo of Italy, said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the achievements made by the Korean people last year. He was convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will successfully carry out the tasks set forth by leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Igor Jurisik, chairman of the Slovenia－Korea Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address opened up a bright prospect for Korea's reunification.
					
					 He held that the peaceful reunification of the Korean peninsula should be achieved by the Koreans through their concerted efforts without fail and the U.S. should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPPK.

articles.title: Reunion conjunta de funcionarios de organismos del partido, Estado, economia y fuerzas armadas
articles.content:
Reunion conjunta de funcionarios de organismos del partido, Estado, economia y fuerzas armadas
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 7 y 8 en esta capital la reunion conjunta de los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, el Estado, la economia y las fuerzas armadas para materializar cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo. 
					Asistieron Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de organismos del Partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, y los de organismos del Partido y el Poder, fabricas y empresas importantes de las localidades. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju. 
					
					El informante dijo que en el historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo caracterizado por el servicio abnegado y calido amor a la patria y el pueblo, el Maximo Dirigente hizo balance orgulloso de los exitos alcanzados en el ano pasado e ilumino el rumbo de la marcha del Ano Nuevo. 
					
					  Dijo que todos los exitos milagrosos logrados en el ano expirado en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion son nobles frutos de la sabia orientacion del Maximo Dirigente. 
					
					Presento las metas por importantes indices a ser cumplidas en este ano en los dominios de la economia nacional y se refirio a los problemas para cumplirlas. 
					
					Insistio en conquistar con antelacion las metas de este ano significativo, que reviste una importancia clave en el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, para glorificar mas la era de Kim Jong Un en prosperidad. 
					
					Luego, se efectuaron las reuniones por diferentes dominios de la economia nacional. 
					
					En ellas discutieron las medidas para plantear a base de la realidad y ciencias las metas combativas por todos los dominios de la economia nacional y alcanzarlas. 
					
					Buscaron con profundidad los rumbos y remedios detallados para cumplir las metas de este ano incumbidas ante los dominios y unidades correspondientes desplegando la campana dinamica para aumentar la produccion y ahorrar al maximo bajo la consigna de autoconfianza y autoabastecimiento y se presentaron las opiniones innovadoras y creativas. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron las decisiones de cumplir con la mision y deber de vanguardistas de la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche en la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo de este ano para alcanzar las metas de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, en acato al proposito y la voluntad del Partido.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Myong Sik fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica Democratica del Congo.

articles.title: Efectuados mitines para cumplir tareas presentadas en mensaje de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting of Foreign Crewmen
 Hamhung, January 9 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting of foreign crewmen was held at Hungnam Port of the DPRK on Monday to support the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the meeting attended by the captain and crewmen of a Belizean-flagged ship, speakers paid deep respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and extended the highest glory to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Referring to the achievements made by the Korean people in the 70-day and 200-day campaigns last year to glorify the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, they said that they are a result of the single-minded unity of the army and people rallied around the great Party and their great capacity for self-development.
					
					 They stressed that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un is important guidelines accelerating the building of socialist power and the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 They wished the Korean people greater success in carrying out the tasks set forth in the New Year Address under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
